lines: 1. O Yesu, an adwaro Atini nyaka chieng`Asayi bedi buta, Ruodha ma jakonya.Ok analuor lwenj Satan ka In ibet buta;Yo maber ok aweyo ka In itelona.
2. Mondo ang`e in koda, Pinyni oywayoa;Aneno gik magombo, Dwonde matemoa;Wasika gi gilwora, Kendo gin e chunya;O Yesu, bi, ikonya, Mondo alo Satan.
3. O Yesu, isewacho duto molu bang`i,Ka ma intie e duong`ni Ginibedi bende.To Yesu, an adwaro Atini nyaka chieng`;Asayi konya pile, Ruodha ma Jawarna.
